description: This file defines the OpenAILike class, which extends the OpenAIChat class to interact with providers using the OpenAI API schema. It includes class attributes for model identification and a default role mapping.

classes.name: OpenAILike
classes.description: A class for to interact with any provider using the OpenAI API schema.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Default constructor for OpenAILike, initializes model id, name, api_key, and default role map.
